body_text:
What's the significance of revealing a character's blood type? A lot of Anime shows will reveal the blood type of one or more of the main characters:


What's the significance of it? What purpose does it serve?
Where did it come from?

What does it mean to be a poster child of type B blood? In the first episode of Ping Pong the Animation, around 9 minutes in, Peco called Smile a poster child for B type blood. What does this mean, exactly? What significance does this have? How does this relate to his personality?
